text: A Simple Twist of Fate is a 1994 American comedy-drama movie directed by Gillies MacKinnon and was based on the 1861 novel Silas Marner by George Eliot. It stars Steve Martin, Gabriel Byrne, Laura Linney, Catherine O'Hara, Stephen Baldwin and Carolyn McCormick. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1994 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies about adoption Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Virginia Category:Movies directed by Gillies MacKinnon
title: A Simple Twist of Fate
